paper_title.en: An Imprimitivity Theorem for Representations of a Semi-direct Product Hypergroup

description.en: The purpose of the present paper is to establish an imprimitivity theorem for representations of a semi-direct product hypergroup K = H x beta G defined by a smooth action beta. of a locally compact group G on a hypergroup H. The proof of the theorem relies on a smooth irreducible absorbing action a of K on a locally compact space X and on an imprimitivity condition for the triplet (K, C-0 (X), alpha).

paper_title.ja: Signed actions of finite hypergroups and the extension problem.
paper_title.en: Signed actions of finite hypergroups and the extension problem.

paper_title.ja: Extensions of the Golden hypergroup by locally compact abelian groups.
paper_title.en: Extensions of the Golden hypergroup by locally compact abelian groups.
A cohomology approach to the extension problem for commutative hypergroups

description.en: The purpose of this paper is to determine all commutative hypergroup extensions of a countable discrete commutative hypergroup by a locally compact Abelian group, in terms of second order cohomology of hypergroups, a notion which generalizes the cohomology of groups.

paper_title.ja: Actions of Finite Hypergroups and Applications to Extension Problem
paper_title.en: Actions of Finite Hypergroups and Applications to Extension Problem

description.ja: The purpose of the present paper is to determine all irreducible actions of hypergroups of order two and all two dimensional irreducible actions of certain hypergroups of order three. Moreover it is shown that these irreducible actions play a principal role on giving an answer to extension problem in the category of finite commutative hypergroups. (AMS Subject Classification : 43A62, 20N20)
description.en: The purpose of the present paper is to determine all irreducible actions of hypergroups of order two and all two dimensional irreducible actions of certain hypergroups of order three. Moreover it is shown that these irreducible actions play a principal role on giving an answer to extension problem in the category of finite commutative hypergroups. (AMS Subject Classification : 43A62, 20N20)

paper_title.ja: Extensions of hypergroups of order two by locally compact abelian groups
paper_title.en: Extensions of hypergroups of order two by locally compact abelian groups

description.ja: The purpose of the present paper is to investigate extension problem in the category of commutative hypergroups. In fact, we determine all extensions of hypergroups of order two by locally compact abelian groups. (AMS Subject Classification : 43A62, 20N20.)
